Specimen Type: Paraffin-embedded tissue blocks (fresh tissue samples embedded for histopathology)
Purpose: To generate accurate morphologic results for hematopathology consultation by examining embedded tissue sections for diagnostic abnormalities in blood, bone marrow, or lymphoid tissues.
Container: Paraffin block (embedding medium used as the specimen container)
Equipment: Microtome, slide warmer, histology-grade slides and coverslips, H&E staining setup, mounting medium, immersion oil, forceps, brushes, PPE
